definitions.body: :Ex 1:13 coal (cf. As. guḫlu, a shining precious stone? COT:Gloss Zim:BP 45)—abs. [[גַּחֶלֶת]] Is 47:14; sf. [[גַּחַלְתִּי]] 2Sa 14:7; pl. [[גֶּחָלִים]] Ps 18:9 + 6 t.; cstr. [[גַּחֲלֵי]] Le 16:12 + 5 t. + Ps 18:14 (del. LXX De Che); sf. [[גֶּחָלָיו]] Is 44:19, [[גֶּחָלֶיהָ]] Ez Eze 24:11; —coal, pl. [[אֵשׁ]] ´[[ג]] coals of fire Le 16:12 (P), 2Sa 22:13 = Ps 18:13 [also Ps 18:14 cf. supr.] Ez Eze 10:2 (in vision); cf. 2Sa 22:9 = Ps 18:9, Job 41:13, also Pr 6:28, Is 44:19; in simile (of strife) Pr 26:21 (opp. [[פֶּחָם]] black coal); Ez Eze 1:13 [[גַּחֲלֵי אֵשׁ]] (of the living creatures); fig. of hope in posterity 2Sa 14:7, of divine judgement, [[רתם]] ´[[ג]] coals of broom-plant Ps 120:4, cf. Ps 140:11, also (negat.) Is 47:14, Ez Eze 24:11; of kindness to enemy Pr 25:22.
